Description: Rim and upper body sherd of a wheelmade Nile silt jar, likely footed, with a rounded rim, and flange or collar below the rim. Exterior wall is covered with pale orange slip on interior and exterior, and decorated with brown painted motifs. Border frieze below the rim with a guilloche pattern; below is a wide frieze bordered by 2 painted lines above and below, separated into squares by 2 painted lines, with a vertical guilloche border between. One square partially preserved, showing a wide floral motif filling the space.
